page.title: 14Evening Activities,Wombourne
page.content: When school is over or work is done for the day many of us do not stay at home. We may go into the garden or out to a restaurant or club ,to the bingo hall, social club or pub,enjoy hobbies, sport or take part in an activity. For the young there are many packs of Brownies, Guides, Cubs and Scouts. Four youth clubs and two other church groups cater for the 7 to 18 age range. Adult activities take place during the day at both the Civic and Community Centres. There are several nurseries for mothers and toddlers, a twins club, keep-fit classes, Rotary and many more. At night many activities take place at the Ounsdale Evening Institute where those over 15 can enjoy a host of over 80 activities. Winemaking,Woodwork and Word Processing,Sailing,Spanish and Silversmithing, Corn Dolly Making and Computing are some on offer this year.
